name: Dumb Jumping Game
description:
Dumb Jumping Game is a dumb game where you jump. There are only two mechanics: jumping and changing direction. You have to jump and move through TWO WHOLE perfectly hand crafted levels to your destination.

This is a prototype project with no plans of turning into a real game...yet. Feel free to take this concept and use it yourself on your own projects. 

(also comes with a hi-lay-ray-us bug when pressing esc when the game is paused because im too dumb and lazy to fix it)
